name: Cricket Academy - Training and Coaching for PRO
name_original: Cricket Academy - Training and Coaching for PRO
description:
Learn the Cricket with Accuracy.
FEATURES
* HD professional videos.
* Video Analysis and comparison.
* Maintain daily performance's record.
* Learn all the CRICKET skills.

Cricket Academy PRO present the v1.0 of Cricket Academy PRO for the users of iPhone & iPad to learn the Cricket diffrenetly. Beginners and professionals can practice these shots and skilss.
* Batting, bowling and fielding.
* Front foot and back foot shots and drives.
* Scoop shots and sweeps.
* Yorkers and bouncers.
* Spin and fast bolwing.
* Googlies and DOOSRA's.
* Catching and throwing.
* Wicket keeping and much more.

Then you can compare your performance by recording your video and after comparing with these videos, you will definitely realize where to improve yourself as a PRO Cricket player and you can store your daily data also.

Download and become a PRO Cricketer.
